text: Falao zu zhong yige mimi gui xin de xinshi shuo:`Yigeren ba cong nimen de zhu fachu de mingzheng zhaoshi nimen, bing shuo “wo de zhu shi zhenzhu”, nimen jiu yao shalu ta ma? Ruguo ta shi yige shuohuang zhe, namo, ta zi shou huangyan zhi hai; ruguo ta shi yige chengshi zhe, namo, tasuoyong yi donghe nimen de zainan, jiang you yibufen lailin nimen, zhenzhu biding bu yindaoguo fen de chang shuohuangyan zhe.
